sentences.english: Well, you mentioned Kungfu, or boxing just now, I would say there are about 200 schools.
sentences.chinese: 你提到了功夫，或拳術，它們至少有200種門派。

sentences.english: Master Wang is the leader of the Hong Men, a group which is noted for its kungfu skills.
sentences.chinese: 王進發師傅是洪門的山主，該門派以其功夫技巧聞名。

sentences.english: Paphos Gate police station is continuing investigations.
sentences.chinese: 帕福斯門派出所正在繼續調查。

sentences.english: This is the devil incarnate gathers the gate faction which under 43,000 monsters audiences establishes.
sentences.chinese: 此乃混世魔王聚集手下四萬三千妖衆成立的門派。

sentences.english: Door-to-door discrimination, in fact, if clearance can blame Round 2, 2 long enough.
sentences.chinese: 門派歧視，其實只要2回合能清怪，2龍足夠了。

sentences.english: Each kungfu familiy have people who are for and against competitions.
sentences.chinese: 每個功夫門派都有支持或反對武術比賽的人。

sentences.english: This seems to mean that Tai Chi Chuan is an absolutely independent martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎說明了太極拳絕對可以稱之爲獨立的武術門派。
